level.heading: Organizers.
level.text: A limited cooperative association shall be organized by one or more organizers.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 301 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
